room_title: Escape room "The Ventriloquist" by The Box Escape Experience in Charlotte
review: Went on recommendations of others, and am glad we did. Both rooms were great! The Ventriloquist was my favorite, but Cold Case Killer really had a twist unlike I've done. They were my 81st and 82nd rooms, both wins! The entire building and decor were superb and Andy was an amazing host!

room_title: Escape room "The Ventriloquist" by The Box Escape Experience in Charlotte
review: I really loved both of their games and the GM/creator was phenomenal! I think my overall favorite was "The Ventriloquist" but "Cold Case Killer" left the deepest impression on me and had me questioning moralistic concepts several days later. I really think both games need to be played to truly understand the gravity of the other. Bravo for such attention to detail, it was not lost.

room_title: Escape room "The Ventriloquist" by The Box Escape Experience in Charlotte
review: Really enjoyed the ventriloquist room. Can't wait to go back and try the other room and the new ones your working on!

room_title: Escape room "The Ventriloquist" by The Box Escape Experience in Charlotte
review: This was my 3rd escape room ever and I loved it! We did the ventriloquist room and some clues were really hard to figure out but it was sooo much fun!
